name: Ludosia Prototype
description:
Available now ! The Ludosia Prototype, come and try it !

Create your game from start to finish

Do you want to create your own video game as well, but without the slightest line of code ?

Then Ludosia was made for you ! As it is both accessible and easy to use, everyone is able to make his own unique, original and personal video game.

All in one

In the world of Ludosia, everything can be customized : the art, the animation, the gameplay, the dialogues, the music, the graphics and the story that your characters will go through, and this without any kind of programmation !

An interactive community

Together, members of the Ludosia community can meet to share their games and assets, and help each other out. You can even trade the contents from your game with others and play their games !
